ComicInfo.Summary:
Eisner-nominated NOWHERE MEN writer ERIC STEPHENSON teams up with red-hot artist SIMON GANE for an all-new ongoing series! We all have advantages over one another, but what if you were capable of things most of us can only imagine? What would you do â€“ and who would you be? A doctor? An athlete? A soldier? A hero? Everyone has to make a choice about how to use the abilities they're born with... but they're not like us.
*Back cover quote:* "Twenty-One Years of Living and Nothing Means Anything To Me" by Richard James Edwards.
ComicInfo.Title: 1: From Despair To Where
